name: immich
description: Work with Immich photo library via claw2immich MCP server - search photos by people, dates, locations, albums
author: OpenClaw Community

examples.title: Find photos with multiple people
examples.description: Search for photos where specific people appear together

examples.title: Find photos by date range
examples.description: Search photos within a specific date range, optionally filtered by location

examples.title: Get photo URLs and download
examples.description: Generate thumbnail and original URLs for photos, optionally download
